title: Readme Challenge
text: Short graded challenge: write a function that returns True if a string is a palindrome.
example:
def is_pal(s):
    s = ''.join(ch for ch in s.lower() if ch.isalnum())
    return s == s[::-1]
print(is_pal('Racecar'))
starter_code:

    return False
